item.title: How do i make random pvp drops
item.dc:creator: @Purely_Pink Purely Pink
item.description:
@Purely_Pink wrote:

It can take a while for someone to post back, trust me. Some people are lazy and don’t post, but you can’t help that.

On Topic: I’m pming you a link to a tutorial for what you’re looking for.

Edit: If that doesn’t help you, just pm me or post here, and i’ll do my best to explain it.
